detaileddescription.para: Title: P02006: To monitor or assess the status of the major blue moki (Latridopsis ciliaris) Fishstocks.

Principal Investigator: Adam Langley Researchers: Nathan Walker Status: Completed Trophia was contracted by the New Zealand Ministry of Fisheries (MFish) to characterise the MOK 1 fishery by analysis of existing commercial catch and effort data and data from other sources; and make recommendations on appropriate methods to monitor or assess the status of this Fishstock.
This project was funded by MFish project MOK2002-01
Outputs include presentation of results to a Ministry of Fisheries Inshore Working Group meeting in March 2004. A Final Research Report is now available from this site.

Langley, A.D.; Walker, N. (In Press). Characterisation of the blue moki (Latridopsis ciliaris) fishery and recommendations for future monitoring of the MOK 1 fishstock. New Zealand Fisheries Assessment Report 2004/33 77p.
